New Media Designs

Started in 2009, New Media Designs provided web design and photography services for private clients, and published community news under the website West Indianapolis Today. At its height, NMD also produced global audio podcasts with such shows as Mac After Dark, The Tech Geek and The 2.0 Show. Eventually it was spun off into its flagship product, IndyGeek.

You can still view the video archive on Vimeo.
